description: Monthly Rolling Forecast: Read monthly RFC data from Google Sheets and write to PostgreSQL
comment: This layout reads from 'Monthly Overall' sheet and stores in rfc_monthly table with append mode

inputSources.name: monthly_rfc
inputSources.comment: Monthly RFC data range starting from row 2 (skips header)

outputs.name: postgres
outputs.deleteCondition: (month IS NULL OR game IS NULL) OR SUBSTRING(month, 1, 4) = '2026'
outputs.comment: Append mode with delete condition for idempotent updates
